EmailTemplate.name: MDF Cancellation Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!SFDC_MDF__c.Name} - Cancellation - {!SFDC_MDF__c.Request_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SFDC_MDF__c.OwnerFullName},
Per your request MDF activity associated with {!SFDC_MDF__c.Request_ID__c} has been cancelled. If this is incorrect, please inform us immediately at interact.operations@ncr.com.
Regards,
NCR Interact Partner Programs Team
